summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of a public alley twenty (20) feet in width over and across a portion of Section Nineteen (19), Township Twenty-four (24) North, Range Four (4) East, W. M., from East Marginal Way to Commercial Water No. 1, as provided in Ordinance No. 43273 of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
